metadata.Title: CVE-2021-24001 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A compromised content process could have performed session history manipulations it should not have been able to due to testing infrastructure that was not restricted to testing-only configurations. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 88.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '88.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
